Package org.jasig.cas.support.oauth.web

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseOAuthWrapperController
    This controller is the base controller for wrapping OAuth protocol in CAS.
    OAuth20AccessTokenController
    This controller returns an access token which is the CAS granting ticket according to the service and code (service ticket) given.
    OAuth20AuthorizeController
    This controller is in charge of responding to the authorize call in OAuth protocol.
    OAuth20CallbackAuthorizeController
    This controller is called after successful authentication and redirects user to the callback url of the OAuth application.
    OAuth20ProfileController
    This controller returns a profile for the authenticated user (identifier + attributes), found with the access token (CAS granting ticket).
    OAuth20WrapperController
    This controller is the main entry point for OAuth version 2.0 wrapping in CAS, should be mapped to something like /oauth2.0/*.
